definition: invested with royal power as symbolized by a crown, stag with antlers of 12 or more branches
details:
adjective
- invested with royal power as symbolized by a crown
= example: invested with royal power as symbolized by a crown
- belonging to or befitting a supreme ruler
= synonyms: purple
- being of the rank of a monarch
= example: being of the rank of a monarch
- of or relating to or indicative of or issued or performed by a king or queen or other monarch
= example: of or relating to or indicative of or issued or performed by a king or queen or other monarch
- established or chartered or authorized by royalty
noun
- stag with antlers of 12 or more branches
= synonyms: royal stag
- a sail set next above the topgallant on a royal mast
